Software in Polar Science 2024

Registration open, programme updated!

Software in Polar Science: 6-7 February 2024, British Antarctic Survey, Cambridge & Online!

Tuesday 6th February
Workshop Day

Wednesday 7th February
Networking Day

Software Carpentry

A focus on Python introducory software skills, we will be running the Plotting and Programming in Python Software Carpentry.

Software Pico-talks and Showcases

Covering AI for Net Zero, Environmental Modelling, Reproducible Research, Data Management, AI for Conservation, Earth Observation, Software for Engineering

Keynote and Panel Discussion with:

  • Dr Scott Hosking
  • Dr Alden Conner
  • Speaker TBC...
  • Speaker TBC...

Connect with multidisciplinary software users and developers!

The event is intended to highlight the role software in polar and environmental research, championing sustainability in its use and helping attendees to gain visibility and training in digital infrastructure.

This event is being organised in collaboration with:
